de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.businessrules.client

Interface IClientNewEmail


  • public interface IClientNewEmail
    This methods are called when an new email is to be sent. The parameter "localRepository" has the entry < "CURRENT_FRAME", {@link NewMailFrame} object>

    ClientNewEmail.java

      • getIdentityExtension

        Map getIdentityExtension(Operator operator,
                       Question question,
                       int projectId,
                       Map localRepository)
        Returns a map and it position data. This component will be shown under the identity-item. This method will be called if the project has been changed.
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator that is logged in
        question - the current question
        projectId - id of the project of the current question
        localRepository - repository that can contain objects
        Returns:
        map with the following entries
        Keytypedescription
        componentJComponentthe component that should be inserted
        weightxDouble the x-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        weightyDouble the y-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        anchorInteger the anchor point for the GridBagLayout
        fillInteger the filling instruction for the GridBagLayout
        insetsJComponent the fillings for the GridBagLayout
        padxJComponent the x-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        padyJComponent the y-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        component_leadingJComponent the insert component to be displayed in the first column
        weightx_leadingDouble the x-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        weighty_leadingDouble the y-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        anchor_leadingInteger the anchor point for the GridBagLayout
        fill_leadingInteger filling instruction for the GridBagLayout
        insets_leadingJComponent the fillings for the GridBagLayout
        padx_leadingJComponent the x-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        pady_leadingJComponent the y-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        width_leadingJComponent with this value you can extended leading component for 2 or 3 columns. for that the component must be zero
        For non-set values ​are seting default values

      • getSubjectExtension

        Map getSubjectExtension(Operator operator,
                      Question question,
                      int projectId,
                      Map localRepository)
        Returns a map and it positiondata. This component will be shown under the subject-row. This method will be called if the project has been changed.
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator that is logged in
        question - the current question
        projectId - id of the project of the current question
        localRepository - repository that can contain objects
        Returns:
        map with the following entries For non-set values ​are seting default values

      • getReceiverExtension

        Map getReceiverExtension(Operator operator,
                       Question question,
                       int projectId,
                       Map localRepository)
        Returns a map and it positiondata. This component will be shown under the getFrom - row. This method will be called if the project has been changed.
        Parameters:
        operator - the operator that is logged in
        question - the current question
        projectId - id of the project of the current question
        localRepository - repository that can contain objects
        Returns:
        map with the following entries
        Keytypedescription
        componentJComponentthe component that should be inserted
        weightxDouble the x-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        weightyDouble the y-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        anchorInteger the anchor point for the GridBagLayout
        fillInteger the filling instruction for the GridBagLayout
        insetsJComponent the fillings for the GridBagLayout
        padxJComponent the x-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        padyJComponent the y-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        component_leadingJComponent the insert component to be displayed in the first column
        weightx_leadingDouble the x-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        weighty_leadingDouble the y-weighting for the GridBagLayout
        anchor_leadingInteger the anchor point for the GridBagLayout
        fill_leadingInteger filling instruction for the GridBagLayout
        insets_leadingJComponent the fillings for the GridBagLayout
        padx_leadingJComponent the x-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        pady_leadingJComponent the y-buffer for the GridBagLayout
        width_leadingJComponent with this value you can extended leading component for 2 or 3 columns. for that the component must be zero
        For non-set values ​are seting default values

                              Question question,

        question - the current question
        projectId - id of the project of the current question
